pr_title: Handle NotAllowed Exception at the client side.

timeline.message: Handle NotAllowed Exception at the client side.

timeline.bodyText: From the ci error. we need to handle this new error type in ClientConnection.cc
timeline.author: jiazhai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -196,6 +196,7 @@ enum ServerError {
 
     TransactionCoordinatorNotFound = 20; // Transaction coordinator not found error
     InvalidTxnStatus = 21; // Invalid txn status error
+    NotAllowedError = 22; // Not allowed error
